metadata.name: Reflections at the Headcrash Hotel
metadata.description: Following the incredible success of the Reflections NFT, Rich Simmons has joined forces with Headcrash Hotel to create their genesis collab. ‘Reflections at the Headcrash Hotel’ is a collection of 333 immersive cinematic loops that invite us to dive into the artwork; exploring how our experience of art can and should evolve as we transition from Web2 to Web3.
